rituals.title: Launch the sandbox flight recorder
rituals.description: Dedicate a deep session to harden the timing instrumentation that keeps the runner honest under load.
steps: Trace at least three full executions (Python, Node, dual-run) and record queue/start/teardown timing.
Add structured telemetry to the Node stream so every run emits latency + resource hints automatically.
Export the latest capture into `workspaces/demo/logs/flight-recorder.json` for the changelog.

rituals.title: Weave the luminary beacon grid
rituals.description: Iterate on the narrative overlay system that keeps palette, soundtrack, and intent visible in the editor.
steps: Storyboard at least two overlay states (calm + launch) including typography, gradients, and motion.
Prototype the transitions in CSS variables or shader-like pseudo code inside the workspace.
Publish a GIF/screenshot or markdown walkthrough linked from the ritual log.

rituals.title: Activate the reviewer ground-station
rituals.description: Pair with another operator to stress-test reviewer radar flows and leave a ready-to-run handoff kit.
steps: Enumerate the last five commits for the feature files and label likely reviewers.
Bundle run instructions, telemetry screenshots, and TODO prompts into a single console note.
Schedule an async check-in and capture any new questions or blockers in the ritual archive.

rituals.title: Rehearse the cloud skyway upgrade
rituals.description: Dry-run the blue/green rollout for Echo Computer cloud services with telemetry stitched into the ritual log.
steps: Spin up the canary environment and smoke-test the public endpoints with synthetic workload traces.
Shift 10-20% traffic through the canary using weighted routing or feature flags while watching error budgets.
Record rollback/rollback-ready commands plus metrics snapshots into the ritual journal for reuse.
